name: Good Boy (ADiggins)
description:
Sally the Skunk wants to be adopted.

Improve yourself, take out your competition and
win yourself a spot in a forever home!

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

WSAD to move. E to interact

IMPROVING YOU
+2⭐ -- Jump the Hoop
+2⭐ -- Scare away the Bees
+2⭐ -- Get Yourself Cleaned up
+2⭐ -- Practice your Puppy Eyes
+2⭐ -- Perfect your Behaviour

TAKING OUT THE COMPETITION
-5⭐ on Goldie -- Make him run through the Mud
-5⭐ on Boris -- Trap him in the Pantry
-5⭐ on Edwina -- Fire up your Stink "Bomb"
